item.description:
The Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant *
350 Mass. Ave., Cambridge (between Central Sq. and MIT)
Thursdays from 8 PM - 11:30 PM

Please buy your own drink to enjoy FREE CONVERSATION in a
relaxed atmosphere. Due to the location, people under 21 will
not be allowed to enter.

If you're Japanese and would like to practice English or learn
a few casual phrases, please join us!... and help us with our
Japanese... ^_^; If you're learning Japanese, please join the
fun too!

* Note: This is the location for this week's event. It will change
every week, so please verify the location weekly.

***Also, if you will be joining us, please make use of public
transportation. Not only is driving while intoxicated
dangerous, but there is hardly any parking available in the area.

So join us! (I'll try to post a sign so you can find us)

~Lindsay
item.name: Japanese Evening Table
